events.message: The applicant submitted the mortgage loan application for a new house purchase. All personal and financial details were provided as required.
The application was categorised under 'Mortgage Loan' based on keywords referring to property and house purchase in the request.
A dedicated loan officer was assigned to the case to personally guide the applicant throughout the mortgage loan process.
Initial review of the mortgage loan application and submitted documents was carried out to confirm eligibility and data completeness.
Additional property appraisal report and updated proof of income were requested from the applicant to support the mortgage application.
Applicant submitted the requested documents including appraisal report and latest pay stubs as part of the mortgage loan process.
A credit check was conducted, showing a stable credit history with no recent defaults or overdue payments affecting the mortgage application.
Comprehensive risk assessment was finalized considering credit score, loan-to-value ratio, and applicant's repayment capacity.
An offer for the mortgage loan terms including interest rate, loan amount, and repayment schedule was presented to the applicant.
The applicant provided positive feedback on the loan offer and agreed to proceed with the terms presented for the mortgage loan.
After thorough evaluation, the mortgage loan application was officially approved by the credit committee.
The mortgage loan funds were disbursed to the applicant's nominated account to facilitate the house property purchase.
Follow-up communication was established to ensure applicant satisfaction and confirm receipt of funds for the property transaction.
The mortgage loan application file was formally closed after successful funding and initial post-loan follow-up.
